trans-unit.source: Provides a control array of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: 提供的控件数组<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The `ListViewArray` class provides an equivalent for the run-time functionality of a Visual Basic 6.0 `ListView` array.
trans-unit.target: `ListViewArray`类提供了等效的运行时功能的 Visual Basic 6.0`ListView`数组。

trans-unit.source: It does not provide the design-time features of a Visual Basic 6.0 control array.
trans-unit.target: 它不提供的 Visual Basic 6.0 控件数组的设计时功能。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 函数和对象在<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空间提供用于连接的工具从到 Visual Basic 6.0 升级[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，这些函数和对象重复可在其他命名空间中找到的功能[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 仅当 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型显著区别它们是所必需[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]实现。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the label for an item is edited by the user.
trans-unit.target: 当用户编辑项的标签时发生。

trans-unit.source: The `AfterLabelEdit` event occurs when the user finishes modifying the text for an item.
trans-unit.target: `AfterLabelEdit`事件发生时在用户完成修改项的文本。

trans-unit.source: The new string that the user types for the item is passed to the event, and the event handler can reject the change.
trans-unit.target: 用户键入项的新字符串传递给该事件，并且事件处理程序可以拒绝此更改。

trans-unit.source: If the event handler rejects the change, the text reverts to the text as it was before the user began editing the item.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件处理程序拒绝更改，文本将恢复为文本中，因为其用户开始编辑项之前。

trans-unit.source: In order for the `AfterLabelEdit` event to be raised, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListView%2A> control must be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 为了使`AfterLabelEdit`事件被引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListView%2A>控件必须设置为`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListView%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A>

trans-unit.target: 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user starts editing the label of an item.
trans-unit.target: 当用户开始编辑项的标签时发生。

trans-unit.source: The `BeforeLabelEdit` event occurs when the user starts modifying the text for an item.
trans-unit.target: `BeforeLabelEdit`事件发生时在用户开始修改项的文本。

trans-unit.source: If the event handler cancels this event, the user cannot change the text.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件处理程序取消此事件，则用户无法更改的文本。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to prevent the user from editing specific items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此事件来防止用户编辑中的特定项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is set to `false`, the `BeforeLabelEdit` event is not raised; all user attempts to change item labels are automatically rejected.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件设置为`false`、`BeforeLabelEdit`不会引发事件; 若要更改项标签的所有用户尝试将自动被都拒绝。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> in a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>中<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray"></xref>单击。

trans-unit.source: The `Click` event passes a <xref:System.EventArgs> to its event handler.
trans-unit.target: `Click`事件传递<xref:System.EventArgs>到其事件处理程序。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Therefore it only indicates that a click has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 因此它仅指示发生了单击操作。

trans-unit.source: If you need more specific mouse information (button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要更具体的鼠标信息 （按钮、 单击、 鼠标轮旋转或位置的数），使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseClick>事件。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseClick>

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseClick> event will not be raised if the click is caused by action other than that of the mouse, such as pressing the ENTER key.
trans-unit.target: 但是，<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseClick>如果单击引起操作不是鼠标，如按 ENTER 键操作，将不会引发事件。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseClick>

trans-unit.source: A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: 由用户的操作系统的鼠标设置确定一次双击。

trans-unit.source: The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click instead of two clicks.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以设置它认为是双击而不是两次单击鼠标按钮点击之间的时间。

trans-unit.source: The `Click` event is raised every time that a control is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: `Click`双击控件每次引发事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have event handlers for the `Click` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events of a [control](ms-help://MS.VSCC.v90/MS.MSDNQTR.v90.en/fxref_system.windows.forms/html/6569d671-0a28-7b3f-dbb8-90c3d272b6e2.htm), the `Click` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events are raised when the control is double-clicked and both methods are called.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你有事件处理程序`Click`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>的事件[控件](ms-help://MS.VSCC.v90/MS.MSDNQTR.v90.en/fxref_system.windows.forms/html/6569d671-0a28-7b3f-dbb8-90c3d272b6e2.htm)、`Click`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>时控件是双击和调用这两种方法将引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: If a control is double-clicked and that control does not support the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> event, the `Click` event might be raised two times.
trans-unit.target: 如果双击控件时，控件不支持<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>事件，`Click`可能引发事件两次。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.target: 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks a column header within the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.

trans-unit.source: The `ColumnClick` event occurs when the user clicks one of the column headers in a details view of the items in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control (when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>).
trans-unit.target: `ColumnClick`事件发生在用户单击中的项的详细信息视图中的列标头之一时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件 (时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The `ColumnClick` event is typically handled to sort the items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, using the clicked column as the column to sort by.
trans-unit.target: `ColumnClick`事件通常用于中的项进行排序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>，使用所单击的列与列要作为排序依据。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The `ColumnReordered` event is a cancelable event and can be canceled by handling the event and setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormCancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `ColumnReordered`事件是可取消的事件，并且可以通过处理该事件并设置取消<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormCancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormCancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if the event is canceled, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.NewDisplayIndex%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs> will not change to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.OldDisplayIndex%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果取消了该事件，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.NewDisplayIndex%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs>不会更改为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.OldDisplayIndex%2A>值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.OldDisplayIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.NewDisplayIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event lets you customize the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control using owner drawing.

trans-unit.source: This event can occur for each column header in the control.
trans-unit.target: 每个列标题控件中可能发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: `Enter` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: `Enter` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> For more information about how to handle events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The `GiveFeedback` event is raised when a drag-and-drop operation is started.
trans-unit.target: `GiveFeedback`启动拖放操作时引发事件。

trans-unit.source: By using the `GiveFeedback` event, the source of a drag event can modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用`GiveFeedback`事件，拖动事件的源可以修改鼠标指针的外观，以便在拖放操作过程中为提供的用户的可视反馈。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an item is activated.
trans-unit.target: 在激活一项时发生。

trans-unit.source: The `ItemActivate` event occurs when the user activates one or more items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: `ItemActivate`事件发生时用户激活中的一个或多个项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The user can activate an item with either a single-click or double-click, depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A> property, or with the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以通过激活某项单击或双击，具体取决于值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A>属性，或键盘。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A>

trans-unit.source: From within the event handler for the `ItemActivate` event, you can reference the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A> properties to access the collection of items selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> to determine which items are being activated.
trans-unit.target: 从事件处理程序中`ItemActivate`事件，你可以引用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A>属性访问集合中的选定项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>以确定正在激活的项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `ItemDrag` event occurs when the user begins dragging an item.
trans-unit.target: `ItemDrag`事件发生在用户开始拖动项时。

trans-unit.source: Typically the event handler for the `ItemDrag` event performs the task of dragging by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 通常的事件处理程序`ItemDrag`事件执行的任务通过调用拖动<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform the tasks necessary to drag items into and out of your application's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此事件来执行将项拖入和移出你的应用程序所必需的任务<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Key events occur in the following order: `KeyDown` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable controls to receive keyboard events, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A> property in the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event-handling method to `true`.

trans-unit.source: Key events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> `KeyPress` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> The `KeyPress` event is not raised by non-character keys; however, the non-character keys do raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> events.
trans-unit.target: 键事件按下列顺序发生︰ <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> `KeyPress` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>`KeyPress`非字符键不会引发事件; 但是，不要引发非字符键<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A> property to sample keystrokes at run time and to consume or modify a subset of common keystrokes.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A>属性示例的键击在运行时和使用或修改的常见击键的子集。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable controls to receive keyboard events, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A> property in the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event-handling method to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要仅在窗体级别处理键盘事件而不使控件能够接收键盘事件，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A>中窗体的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>到事件处理方法`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control should reposition its child controls.
trans-unit.target: 在控件应重新定位其子控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: The `Layout` event occurs when child controls are added or removed, when the bounds of the control changes, and when other changes occur that can affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: `Layout`事件发生时添加或删除时的边界的控件更改，以及在出现的其他更改可能会影响控件的布局子控件。

trans-unit.source: The layout event can be suppressed by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 布局事件，可以通过使用抑制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Suspending layout enables you to perform multiple actions on a control without having to perform a layout for each change.
trans-unit.target: 挂起的布局，可在控件上执行多个操作，而无需执行一次布局针对每项更改。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you resize and move a control, each operation would raise a `Layout` event.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你调整大小，并将控件移动，每个操作都会引发`Layout`事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the input focus leaves the control.
trans-unit.target: 在输入的焦点离开控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> `Leave` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> `Leave` For more information about how to handle events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 当你通过使用键盘 （选项卡上，按 SHIFT + TAB 等），或通过调用更改焦点<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>方法，焦点事件按下列顺序发生︰ <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> `Leave` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>当更改焦点，通过使用鼠标或调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>方法，焦点事件按下列顺序发生︰<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>`Leave`有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。 </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is clicked by the mouse.

trans-unit.source: Clicking a mouse button when the pointer is over a shape typically raises the following series of events from the control: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseDown> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Click> `MouseClick` <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseUp> Two clicks that occur close enough in time, as determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system, will generate an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick> event instead of the second `MouseClick` event.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标指针位于形状通常时，单击鼠标按钮将引发以下一系列的控件中的事件︰ <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseDown> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Click> `MouseClick` <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseUp>两次单击关闭发生的时间非常具体由用户的操作系统的鼠标设置确定将生成<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick>而不是第二个事件`MouseClick`事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseUp> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Click> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseDown>

trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件是逻辑上控件的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: They are often raised by other actions, such as pressing the ENTER key when the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 它们通常由其他操作，如按 ENTER 键在控件有焦点时引发。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer rests on the control.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标指针停放在控件上时发生。

trans-unit.source: A typical use of `MouseHover` is to display a tool tip when the mouse pauses on a control within a specified area around the control (the "hover rectangle").
trans-unit.target: 一个典型用途`MouseHover`是当鼠标悬停在控件 （"悬停矩形"） 周围的指定区域中控件上时显示工具提示。

trans-unit.source: The pause required for this event to be raised is specified in milliseconds by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 引发此事件所需的暂停指定以毫秒为单位通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `MouseHover` event is defined and detected in connection with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: `MouseHover`定义和检测到门户中的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `QueryContinueDrag` event is raised when there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state during a drag-and-drop operation.

trans-unit.source: The `QueryContinueDrag` event enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: `QueryContinueDrag`事件允许拖动源确定是否应取消拖放操作。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is resized.
trans-unit.target: 当调整控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: To determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the resized control, you can cast the `sender` parameter of the <xref:System.EventArgs> data to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> and get its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property (or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> properties individually).
trans-unit.target: 若要确定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>的调整大小的控件，可以强制转换`sender`参数<xref:System.EventArgs>数据到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>并获取其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>属性 (或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>属性单独)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.EventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: To handle custom layouts, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Layout> event instead of the `Resize` event.
trans-unit.target: 若要处理自定义布局，使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Layout>事件而不是`Resize`事件。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Layout>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Layout> event is raised in response to a `Resize` event, but also in response to other changes that affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Layout>在响应中引发事件`Resize`事件，但还会在响应其他影响控件的布局更改。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Layout>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> is in virtual mode and a search is taking place.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is in virtual mode and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.FindNearestItem%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> method is called.

trans-unit.source: When handling this event, you should calculate which item from the list of items supplied by the Items property matches the search criteria and set the `SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs.Index` property to the index of the ListViewItem.
trans-unit.target: 处理此事件时，你应计算从的项提供项属性匹配搜索条件和组列表的哪一项`SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs.Index`的列表视图项的索引的属性。

trans-unit.source: If an item is not provided, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.FindNearestItem%2A> and FindItemWithText will return a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供某个项，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.FindNearestItem%2A>和 FindItemWithText 将返回空引用 (在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.FindNearestItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> methods, or by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Leave> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating> `Validated` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Leave> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating> `Validated` If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `false`, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating> and `Validated` events are suppressed.

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 仅当 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型显著区别它们是所必需[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]实现。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> is in virtual mode and the selection state of a range of items has changed.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>是在虚拟模式和选择的一系列项的状态已更改。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is not in virtual mode, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.ItemSelectionChanged> event will occur.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>不位于虚拟模式下，<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.ItemSelectionChanged>事件发生一次。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.ItemSelectionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。
